Title: The construction of the bridge over the Yangzi at Nanjing is a great victory of Mao Zedong Thought!
Publisher: Jiangsusheng geming weiyuanhui (江苏省革命委员会)
Notes: According to the official propaganda, workers have built this bridge, the Yangzi Bridge at Nanjing, all by themselves, guided only by Mao's writings. Engineers are no longer needed. Liu Shaoqi's name is crossed out on the blueprint.
Theme: The Yangzi River Bridge in Nanjing
